article: Dear David, Thank you very much  _  your letter. Beijing  _  beautiful! People in Beijing are friendly .  _  I like Beijing and I like China. Now I'm fine and I'm busy with my lessons. I have seven classes every day. There are  _  in the morning and three in the afternoon. I have nine  _  this term . I like math, biology and history. My  _  subject is science, because it is very interesting. My English is very  _  , and I like it. But I  _  like Chinese, because it is too difficult  _  me, and I can't learn it well. Do you play soccer? Can you  _  Chinese? I hope you can come to China one day. Yours, Jim
